name: Gambolabs
description: Social and New Media Industries - mobile
overview:
Gambo Labs is bringing a revolution in the social and new media industries. We are focusing on high growth markets where our creative startup ideas are solving both pain and pleasure points for consumers and corporations alike. At Gambo Labs, as game changers, we believe that we are in an exciting time and want to capitalize on the trends that are bringing multiple paradigm shifts in the industry.

Having built solid relationships over the years with investments bankers, corporations, investors (angels and venture capitalists), we are incubating several startups with high profile individuals endorsing our current ventures.

New sectors that we are involved in are gamification, location-based services, rewards, coupons and gaming. We have multiple active startups in the above explosive market segments.
